HotelElement.Name: Trinity Waters Boutique Beachfront Holiday Apartments

Description.Text: Stop at Trinity Waters Boutique Beachfront Hotel to discover the wonders of Cairns. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like luggage storage, car park, airport transfer, babysitting, family room are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating, wake-up service, balcony/terrace to ensure a restful night. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as hot tub, outdoor pool, diving, fishing, spa. Convenience and comfort makes Trinity Waters Boutique Beachfront Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Cairns.
